body_html:
I have to ask : why summarize in repr ? It is not usually meant for screen-friendly output (there is print for that).
Also, if there is need for a more configurable output, why not go the route of lxml and add a more versatile Tensor.tostring method and keep print and repr as simple as possible ?
body_text:
I have to ask : why summarize in repr ? It is not usually meant for screen-friendly output (there is print for that).
Also, if there is need for a more configurable output, why not go the route of lxml and add a more versatile Tensor.tostring method and keep print and repr as simple as possible ?
body:
I have to ask : why summarize in `repr` ? It is not usually meant for screen-friendly output (there is `print` for that).
Also, if there is need for a more configurable output, why not go the route of lxml and add a more versatile `Tensor.tostring` method and keep `print` and `repr` as simple as possible ?
